### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 83
- Low Temperature (°F): 64
- Precipitation (in): 0.0
- Wind Speed (mph): 7
- Conditions: Sunny

### Field Notes
- Low flow conditions, wadeable at WQ-02
- Aquatic vegetation growth normal for season
- Cr at WQ-03: 132 ug/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (132 ug/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 ug/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (84.2 ug/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Field inspection: unpermitted discharge pipe identified between WQ-02 and WQ-03 at RM 18.6

### Events
- WQ-01 solar panel cleaned, charging restored to 100%
- Fish kill report investigated near WQ-04: no pathology found, heat stress suspected
- Streamflow at USGS gauge 14.2 cfs

### Notes
- Day 25 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 132 ug/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.

### Sediment Analysis
- Total Organic Carbon (%): 2.58
- Grain Size D50 (mm): 0.11
- Benthic Macroinvertebrate Index: 5.3
